description:
Seimei deduces the true nature of Takeru`s powers, and how they are the key for unlocking the future.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Don`t Give Up On the Future! I`ll Seize the Possibility I`ve Long Desired
Mirai o Akiramenna! Nozomi Tsuzuketa Kanousei o Kono Te ni
未来を諦めんな! 望み続けた可能性をこの手に
